{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = System-On-Module + Carrier Single Board Computer |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = SeeedStudio |model = Odyssey STM32MP157C |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = Z4T-SESTM32P157 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = STMicro;STM32MP157C; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64,PowerPC, --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 650 <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Kingston;EMMC04G-M627; |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K256M16TW-107; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Microchip;KSZ9031RN; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = A2:3A:2F |oui = 1C:BA:8C
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2018.11; |stockos = Linux;4.19.9-stm32-r1;Debian 10
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB Type C, Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1), |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, Bluetooth 4.2 (BLE), RTC w/ battery, DVP Camera Interface, Audio 3.5mm out, I2C, GPIO, |addchip = 14 Channel PMIC;STMicro;STPMIC1A;;1;,,, Audio Codec w/ Class D Speaker Driver;Cirrus;WM8960G;;1;,,, 500mA Enhanced Dual Channel Power Switch,STMicro;STMPS2252;;1;,,, 3A, 36V Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Monolithic Power;MP9943;;1;,,, 2A, 6V Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Monolithic Power;MP2161;;1;,,, ESD Protection Diode;ON Semi;NUP4114;;3;,,, Transil Array for ESD Protection;STMicro;ESDA6V1;;1;,,, UHS Dual Buffer with 3-STATE Outputs;Fairchild;NC7WZ126;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = debian |defaultpass = temppwd |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 04/26/2020 |estreldate = 01/2020 |estprice = 55 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AMPAK AP6236 |rad1modif = SDIO 2.0 |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43436; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = integrated |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{see also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[STMicroelectronics]]'' STM32MP157C Dual-core Cortex-A7 w/Cortex M4 Coprocessor *Memory: 512MB (SDRAM) DDR3 *Onboard Storage: 4 GiB eMMC, TF card (max. 128GB) / MMC card slot *WiFi & BT: [[AMPAK]] AP6236 Bluetooth 4.2 *Network: 1x Gbe *USB: 2 USB 2.0 *GPIO: 1x 40-pin Headers, *Power Source: DC Jack 12V~24V/2 or USB Type-C
==Links of Interest== :[https://www.seeedstudio.com/ODYSSEY-STM32MP157C-p-4464.html]
*[https://wiki.seeedstudio.com/ODYSSEY-STM32MP157C/ ''ODYSSEY â€“ STM32MP157C'' on '''seeedStudio Wiki'''] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/som-baseboard-combo-forms-st-cortex-a7-m4-hybrid-based-sbc/ ''SoM/baseboard combo forms ST Cortex A7/M4 hybrid-based SBC'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/01/21/odyssey-stm32mp157c-sbc-feature-stmicro-stm32mp157c-cortex-a7-m4-soc/ ''ODYSSEY-STM32MP157C SBC Feature STMicro STM32MP157C Cortex-A7/M4 SoC'' on '''CNXSOFT''' ]
